raw_body: DANIEL – GRACE – Beloved wife of Claude Daniel,​ everloving mother of Conrad,​ Gerald and Cherubim,​ loving mother-in-law of Wendy,​ Dushyanthi and Anita,​ darling grandmother of Shalomi and Yadavan,​ precious great-grandmother of Yadiran and well-loved sister of Jebamani,​ Johnson,​ late Lily and Glory,​ entered glory on 29th December 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour for viewing from 2.00 p.m. on 4th January 2024 (Thursday). Funeral Service will be held on the same day at 3.00 p.m. at the Parlour followed by burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (General Christian Section).000201
